import React from 'react'; import { Minus, Plus, Trash2, ShoppingBag, ArrowLeft, Tag } from 'lucide-react'; const ShoppingCartPage = ({ cart, getTotalItems, removeFromCart, updateCartQuantity, setShowCartPage, promoCode, setPromoCode, appliedPromo, applyPromoCode, removePromoCode, subtotal, shipping, tax, discount, total }) => { if (cart.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added any sneakers to your cart yet.

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Shopping Cart

{getTotalItems()} items
{/* Cart Items */}

Cart Items

{cart.map((item) => (
{/* Product Image */}
{item.is_flash_sale && (
SALE
)}
{/* Product Details */}

{item.name}

{item.category}

{item.sizes && item.sizes.length > 0 && (

Size: {item.sizes[0]}

)} {item.colors && item.colors.length > 0 && (

Color: {item.colors[0]}

)}
{/* Price and Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{item.sale_price ? ( <>
${(item.sale_price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
) : (
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
)}
))}
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

{/* Promo Code */}
setPromoCode(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter code" className="flex-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black" />
{appliedPromo && (
{appliedPromo}
)}
{/* Price Breakdown */}
Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping {shipping === 0 ? ( FREE ) : ( `$${shipping.toFixed(2)}` )}
Tax ${tax.toFixed(2)}
{discount > 0 && (
Discount -${discount.toFixed(2)}
)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Free Shipping Banner */} {subtotal < 100 && (

Add ${(100 - subtotal).toFixed(2)} more for FREE shipping!

)} {/* Checkout Button */} {/* Security Badge */}
Secure Checkout

Your payment information is protected

{/* Recently Viewed or Recommendations */}

You might also like

Recommended products will appear here based on your cart items

); }; export default ShoppingCartPage;
